refnamediv.refpurpose: Send a query to MonetDB server

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: monetdb_query sends a query to a database. The result is a query handle that may be used to retrieve various information about the result. This handle becomes a default parameter for various functions that accept query handle as an argument. If there was an error during query execution, &false is returned. In that case one can use monetdb_errno and monetdb_error to get detailed information about error.
